Title: Vampire in Venice
Director: Augusto Caminito, Klaus Kinski, Maurizio Lucidi, Luigi Cozzi(co-director)
Writer: Alberto Alfieri (story), Leandro Lucchetti (story), Augusto Caminito (screenplay)
Actors: Klaus Kinski, Christopher Plummer, Donald Pleasence, Barbara De Rossi
Plot: Professor Paris Catalano visits Venice, to investigate the last known appearance of the famous vampire Nosferatu during the carnival of 1786.
